abstract: Record profits for its investment banking advisory businesses and vast improvement in its trading results contributed to the gain.
snippet: Record profits for its investment banking advisory businesses and vast improvement in its trading results contributed to the gain.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase & Company reported a 68 percent gain in fourth-quarter earnings yesterday, ending 2006 on a high note that showed record profits for its investment banking advisory businesses and vast improvement in its trading results.

headline.main: JPMorgan Chase Posts 68% Rise in Earnings
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Chase Posts 68% Rise in Earnings
